meanings.sent1: At dusk, the sky turns a deep shade of blue.
meanings.sent2: We went for a walk at dusk to enjoy the peaceful evening.
meanings.sent3: The animals come out to play at dusk, like a natural party time.
meanings.sent4: The city was shrouded in dusk, a blanket of darkness settling in.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of dusk is unmatched, a time of transition and tranquility.

meanings.sent1: As the sun sets, the room begins to dusk slowly.

meanings.sent3: His mood seemed to dusk as the evening wore on.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the past can sometimes dusk our present reality.
meanings.sent5: The world around us can dusk suddenly, catching us by surprise.
